desc: Goodbyes are not forever...For many families, a funeral service is a tribute to life and the choices made at the time of arranging a funeral can help truly celebrate the life of their loved one. Creating a personalised service has profound impact – both on those in attendance and on those watching via a live stream.

layout.text: Celebrate the life of your loved one...
We believe that keepsakes created for funerals and memorial services should be beautiful tributes to the individuals who's lives are being celebrated.
